title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset.
EB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder and double clicking on the first column name, the expected result is that the first column in the expression builder should display the alias name instead of the original name. However, the actual result is that the original name of the first column is listed below in the expression builder, and the alias name appears above as row['column1'] after double clicking the original name.
